extensionDescription.message: Collapses the Google+ stream while keeping live updates: hides comments, collapses posts, etc.
extensionDescription.description: Description of the extension, as shown in the Web Store

gplus_dateEdited.description: Text in parentheses after the date for edited posts, e.g. '5:09 PM (edited)'

gplus_dateLongPrefix.description: Text that needs to be preserved when abbreviating date text.  Used with gplus_date_long_suffix.  A '.' is added after, e.g. 'Yesterday' becomes 'Yest.'

gplus_dateLongSuffix.description: Text that is dropped when abbreviating date text.  Used with gplus_date_long_prefix.  The text is replaced with a '.', e.g. 'Yesterday' becomes 'Yest.'

options_nav_general_label.description: Name of the tab in the options page

options_nav_summary_label.description: Name of the options group for the text inside the bar when a post is collapsed

options_nav_summaryIncludeThumbnails.message: Include thumbnails of photos inside post

options_nav_preview_label.description: Name of the options group for mouse-over instant preview

options_nav_pages_label.description: Name of the tab in the options page

options_nav_global_label.description: Name of the options group that acts as defaults for all pages

options_nav_global_desc.message: Configure these page options if you want to configure all types of pages (Stream, circles, Incoming, Notifications, Sparks, etc.) in the same way.

options_nav_compat_label.description: Name of the tab in the options page

options_nav_compat_desc.message:
This page is related to compatibility with other extensions that you may have installed for Google+.
You can ignore these options.
options_nav_compat_desc.description: Name of the tab in the options page

options_nav_compatSgp_label.description: Name of the options group for SGPlus

options_nav_compatSgp_desc.message:
WARNING: Compatibility with SGPlus is in beta. There are still performance and instability issues. Each option below adds more processing to SGPlus's frequent heavy-duty refreshes, possibly slowing down your browser and causing frequent pauses (annoying when you're typing).
Please report any problems to the discussion about SGPlus compatibility on Google+.
options_nav_compatSgp_desc.description: Text notifying user of current state of compatibility and warning of problems

options_nav_compatSgp.message: Enable compatibility with SGPlus: make posts collapsible

options_nav_compatSgpComments.message: Make comments collapsible and track comments (compatibility must be enabled)

options_nav_compatSgpCache.message: Enable speed cache to prevent refresh flicker (compatibility must be enabled) — $BEGIN_RED$ Experimental $END_RED$

options_nav_compatSgpUsage_desc.message: <b>NOTE:<b> Google+ tabs must be reloaded after changing any of these options.
options_nav_compatSgpUsage_desc.description: Text giving users instructions for above options
